701579f-a.title: Bronx: Paul Avenue - Bedford Park Boulevard
701579f-a.text:
Paul Avenue, south of Bedford Park Boulevard, showing a coffee
shack that serves the laborers working on the construction of the new
thoroughfare and the Hunter College grounds. On the right is visible
the elevated structure of the I.R.T. subway, on Jerome AVenue.
May 5, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
701579f-a.folder: Paul Avenue & Bedford Park Boulevard, Bronx, NY
